name: Billiards Dungeon Alpha
description:
Billiards Dungeon is a pool-based, procedurally-generated rogue-lite. Players control the direction and force of the cue-ball character against a range of enemies. Explore and battle through floors of unique dungeons that change with every game, while unlocking more items in subsequent runs.

Come adventurers! I, the Dark Lord, challenge you to journey through my realms in order to uncover mythical relacs.
Ulzaark

You have been challenged by the the Dark-Lord, Ulzaark.
Journey through his realm in order to uncover relics lost in time. Play multiple characters as the mortal bards spin your tale throughout the realms. Unlock a Knight, Rogue, and Mage with specific skills that will assist you in your journey. Each time you beat the game, you will gain access to a special item for your next attempt.

The Gameplay: You are a cue-ball character moving through billiards-based, procedurally-generated floors. Use your mouse to control the direction and force of your character as you battle through rooms. Defeat an army of fantasy creatures by smashing into them or sending them into bottomless pits.

This is an Alpha of the game, play through one level of the dungeon and get a taste of the adventure! Please note that all aspects of the game are subject to change before final release. Many of these features are in a function forward state and polish will be added to the UI and textures in the future.
